name: 薛文景
objective: 本課程主要介紹有關材料反應動力學的基礎理論與技術。n this class, proportionality between the net rate of an electrode reaction and the current is established. The goal of this course is to devisee a theory that can quantitatively rationalized the observe behaviour of electrode kinetics with respect to potential and concentration.
schedule:
1-2. Review of homogeneous kinetics.
3. The Arrhenius equation and potential energy surfaces.
4. Activated complex theory.
5-6. Essentials of electrode reactions.
7-8.Model based on free energy curves.
8-10. Midterm reports and oral test.
11-12. Kinetics model based on electrochemical potentials.
13-14 Implications of the currrent-potential characteristic.
15. Effects of mass transfer.
16-17. Very facile kinetics- reversible behaviours.
17-18 Microscopic theories of charge-transfer kinetics,
\Final Exam.\
